extension.description:
Converts movie and episode durations from format MINUTES to H:MM, H, HH, M, MM
Example: 113 minutes could be converted to 1:53 using DurationHelper.Duration.H:MM
Property names (home):
DurationHelper.Duration.H:MM DurationHelper.Duration.H DurationHelper.Duration.HH DurationHelper.Duration.M DurationHelper.Duration.MM DurationHelper.DBID DurationHelper.InputDurationMinutes
For use with other containers like home screen widgets set the following properties when the container is focused:
(home) DurationHelper.WidgetContainerId to the container ID (Example: 8000)
(home) DurationHelper.WidgetContainerWindowName to the window name where the container resides (Example: home)
Important: Unset the WidgetContainer-properties when leaving focus from the container/widget.

Useful lightweight features and countless carefully crafted usability refinements make you enjoy an intuitive user experience you would expect from a retail media player with an awesome UI.

- [New view type] Added new additional "Wall View": 4x12 (existing variants are: 2x7, 3x9)
